title: 244-Georgian Folklore: Here Fishy Fishy
itunes:title: 244-Georgian Folklore: Here Fishy Fishy
description:
A story from Georgian folklore about a king who needs a cure for his condition, the prince who decided that cure was going to be his new pet, and all the problems that come from an animal blood eye wash so maybe don't do an animal blood eye wash.

If you give the creature of the week the moon, he's going to want the sun to go with it. Then, we're all pretty much doomed.

--
